kv14.3:1.3_0: Yā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva sotaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv14.3:2.1_0: Cakkhuviññāṇassa anantarā sotaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, na vattabbaṁ—
kv14.3:2.2_0: “yā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva sotaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv14.3:2.6_0: Nanu sotaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv14.3:2.8_0: Hañci sotaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:5.1_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:5.3_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:6.1_0: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:6.9_0: Hañci “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇan”ti—
kv14.3:6.10_0: attheva suttanto, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:8.5_0: Yā jivhāviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva kāyaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv14.3:8.7_0: jivhāviññāṇassa anantarā kāyaviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, na vattabbaṁ—
kv14.3:8.8_0: “yā jivhāviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva kāyaviññāṇassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv14.3:8.12_0: nanu kāyaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv14.3:8.14_0: Hañci kāyaviññāṇaṁ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:11.1_0: Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:11.3_0: Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:12.1_0: Jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇanti?
kv14.3:12.9_0: Hañci “jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇan”ti—
kv14.3:12.10_0: attheva suttantoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv14.3:14.4_0: Nanu atthi koci naccati gāyati vādeti, rūpañca passati, saddañca suṇāti, gandhañca ghāyati, rasañca sāyati, phoṭṭhabbañca phusatīti?
kv14.3:14.6_0: Hañci atthi koci naccati gāyati vādeti, rūpañca passati, saddañca suṇāti, gandhañca ghāyati, rasañca sāyati, phoṭṭhabbañca phusati, tena vata re vattabbe—
